title: A Game of Vampires
description: A 20K Prequel Novella to The Vampire Games SeriesI'm ready to pull off the biggest con of my life. The only problem? The Lord I serve has just brought me to an island whilst he attends something called the 'V Games'.I was set to spend a week in this icy place where the sun never rises, staying in a castle owned by a peculiar couple called the Helsings. But everything's changed.Vampires exist. And this is no game. It's pure hell. And the worst thing? The love of my life is one of the contestants.If I don't save her, no one will.I'm coming for you, Evangeline.
author: Caroline Peckham
